labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce

issue.body:
### Issue URL (Social Widget) [https://www.youtube.com/@tunetankmusic/about](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2F%40tunetankmusic%2Fabout) ### Comment > I used AdGuard on Chromium, Brave, and Firefox. While AdGuard is active I can not unsubscribe from any video on YouTube on any browser. Disabling and trying the page again fails. issue.title: Infinite "connection checking" loading

labels.name: A: Waiting for data
labels.description: Waiting for more information from the user

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

Adguard 4.3 Nightly 18

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://modyolo.com and https://apkmody.com

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Legitimate URL Shortener, Fanboy's Enhanced Tracking List, Peter Lowe's Blocklist, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts

### Social Widgets

AdGuard Social Media filter, Fanboy's Social Blocking List

### Annoyances

AdGuard Annoyances filter, AdGuard Cookie Notices filter, AdGuard Popups filter, AdGuard Mobile App Banners filter, AdGuard Other Annoyances filter, AdGuard Widgets filter, Adblock Warning Removal List, Fanboy's Annoyances, Web Annoyances Ultralist, I don't care about cookies

### Security

Online Malicious URL Blocklist, NoCoin Filter List

### Other

Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion, AdGuard Experimental filter

### DNS filters

AdGuard DNS filter

### Language-specific

AdGuard Chinese filter, AdGuard Dutch filter, AdGuard French filter, AdGuard German filter, AdGuard Japanese filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese filter, AdGuard Turkish filter, AdGuard Ukrainian filter, ABPindo, ABPVN List, Adblock List for Finland, AdBlockID, Bulgarian list, CJX's Annoyances List, Dandelion Sprout's Nordic Filters, Dandelion Sprout's Serbo-Croatian List, EasyList China, EasyList Czech and Slovak, EasyList Dutch, EasyList Germany, EasyList Hebrew, EasyList Italy, EasyList Lithuania, EasyList Polish, EasyList Portuguese, EasyList Spanish, EasyList Thailand, Estonian List, Frellwit's Swedish Filter, Greek AdBlock Filter, Hungarian filter, Icelandic ABP List, IndianList, KAD - Anti-Scam, Latvian List, List-KR, Liste AR, Liste FR, Macedonian adBlock Filters, Official Polish filters for AdBlock, uBlock Origin & AdGuard, Persian Blocker, Polish Annoyances Filters, Polish Anti Adblock Filters, Polish Anti-Annoying Special Supplement, Polish GDPR-Cookies Filters, Polish Social Filters, road-block light, ROList, ROLIST2, RU AdList - Counters, Xfiles, xinggsf, YousList

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Hide your search queries, Send Do-Not-Track signals, Self-destruction of third-party cookies, Disable cache for third-party requests, Block third-party Authorization header, Block WebRTC, Block Push API, Block Location API, Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests, Protect from DPI

### Add your comment and screenshots

1. It still shows infinite loading for "checking site connection security" after the site repeated loading when adguard is on but when I disable it, the site connection settings loads and check itself and redirects me to the site. Re-enabling protection brings back the connection check issue.

2. infinite loading for "checking site connection security"-

comment.body:
https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/164626#issuecomment-1782977135
stealth mode with the current filters solves it, still trying it;
disabling stealth modules one by one-
1. general ads blocking, tracking protection, annoyance blocking, DNS protection, Firewall, Browsing Security; no issues
2. Tracking methods and all filters, HTTPS filtering, userscripts no issues
3. Browser API, and Miscellaneous categories too couldn't reproduce the issue...

However, the exported settings I had been using does produce the issue. Would you like to have the export file to check why its produce only through that?
